History was made at this year's Oscars ceremony.

In an evening of surprise wins, there were an emotional acceptance speeches courtesy of Brad Pitt, Laura Dern and Joaquin Phoenix, who criticised inequality and paid tribute to his brother River Phoenix, who died in 1993.

Meanwhile, Olivia Colman had the audience in stitches before presenting Phoenix with his award.

Below is a list of all the evening's winners.

Le Mans ‘66/Ford v Ferrari

The Irishman

Jojo Rabbit

Joker

Little Women

Marriage Story

1917

Parasite – ​WINNER

Bong Joon-ho – Parasite – ​WINNER
